meta.title: ~/emilynguyen
meta.description: Emily Nguyen - Software Engineer specializing in developer tooling, CI/CD, and AI-integrated workflows

profile.name: Emily Nguyen
profile.bio: UC Berkeley CS grad with 5+ years building CI/CD systems, test frameworks, and LLM-powered automation at scale. Currently at Meta working on test infrastructure for Reality Labs. Building autonomous coding agents and developer tools for faster shipping.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Built AI-powered developer tooling including LLM IDE plugins and an AI agent pipeline that auto-generates team wiki docs from code changes. Designed end-to-end test automation pipelines for embedded wearable devices and led a 3-engineer testing team, surfacing 72 bugs pre-release.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Released the Dolby Atmos Plugin for Unreal Engine with a team of 12, in collaboration with Epic Games. Built Python interfaces for a real-time audio C++/C SDK and optimized CI/CD pipelines, improving speed by 33%.

experience.title: Code Coach
experience.description: Taught programming to students ages 7-16 in personalized sessions. Led nine week-long camps with 12-14 students each.

projects.name: AI-Powered Developer Tooling
projects.description: LLM tool-use automation system for autonomous coding agents â€” hook-based orchestration, real-time terminal status indicators, dual-agent pre-push code review gate, and a multi-agent framework with persistent cross-session memory.

projects.name: Pixietown
projects.description: Multi-agent orchestration visualizer with real-time state management. Python bridge polls task state files and broadcasts agent activity over WebSocket to a pixel-art frontend rendering live orchestration status.

projects.name: Dolby Atmos for Unreal
projects.description: Cross-platform real-time audio processing SDK plugin for Unreal Engine, released in collaboration with Epic Games.

projects.name: ArkAngel
projects.description: 2D top-down adventure RPG with dialogue branching, player movement, and minigames.

projects.name: VR Escape Room
